snippet: Newtown, Conn., for a while at least, will stop accepting offers for special events paying tribute to the victims and providing a diversion from the catastrophe at Sandy Hook Elementary School.
abstract: Newtown, Conn, will at least temporarily stop accepting offers for special events paying tribute to Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting victims, giving a needed diversion from catastrophe; town's first selectman, E Patricia Llodra, believes that those affected need to take a break from constant reminders of what happened.
lead_paragraph: Newtown, Conn., for a while at least, will stop accepting offers for special events paying tribute to the victims and providing a diversion from the catastrophe at Sandy Hook Elementary School.

headline.main: Ready for Less-Tearful Future, Newtown Is Declining Tributes
headline.print_headline: Ready for Less-Tearful Future, Newtown Is Declining Tributes
